definition: and/furthermore/also/together with/(not) at all/simultaneously/to combine/to join/to merge
roof tile/abbr. for 瓦特[wa3 te4]
flower vase/fig. just a pretty face/CL:對|对[dui4]
Jinpingmei or the Golden Lotus (1617), Ming dynasty vernacular novel, formerly notorious and banned for its sexual content
lit. to guard one's mouth like a closed bottle (idiom); tight-lipped/reticent/not breathing a word
thermos bottle/vacuum bottle/hot water dispenser (appliance)/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Suddenly I had the idea of writing a message in a bottle.
sentences.chinese: “我突然冒出了写一封“瓶中信”的念头。

sentences.english: Bottle-feeding lets me know how much nutrition the baby has had.
sentences.chinese: 瓶喂使我知道宝宝到底吸收了多少营养。

sentences.english: This passage is about the design of injection mould for the gland of ablution fluid bottle.
sentences.chinese: 本文是关于沐浴液瓶压盖注塑模具的设计。

sentences.english: All others who found—and opened bottles—would be put to death.
sentences.chinese: 其他发现并打开瓶中信的人将会被处死。

sentences.english: Then, I turn the jar upside down.
sentences.chinese: 然后，我把广口瓶倒过来。

sentences.english: He pulled out a one-gallon, wide-mouth jar and set it on the table in front of him.
sentences.chinese: 他拿出一个一加仑的广口瓶放在他面前的桌上。

sentences.english: Think of a battery as a bottle for energy, and the power density as the size of the bottle’s neck.
sentences.chinese: 想象电池是一个能量瓶，电能密度就是瓶颈的尺寸。

sentences.english: So Jack deposits a urine sample in a small jar and takes it to the drugstore.
sentences.chinese: 于是杰克带着一小瓶尿样来到了药店。

sentences.english: The suppliers have lumbered me with 100 bottles of beer I didn't want.
sentences.chinese: 供应商硬塞给我100瓶我不想要的啤酒。

sentences.english: The machine bottles 15000 jars of cold cream a day.
sentences.chinese: 这台机器一天能装一万五千瓶冷霜。

sentences.english: He racked all the bottles of wine after dinner.
sentences.chinese: 饭后他将一瓶瓶酒都放在酒架上。

sentences.english: It's cheap to make too, something like a crystal vial and two ragveil.
sentences.chinese: 同时，它非常便宜，一个水晶瓶和两个拉格维花就行。

sentences.english: Stream north Huping cliff, towering cliffs, towering like a bottle-shaped pot and name.
sentences.chinese: 涧北有壶瓶崖，危崖万丈，突兀类壶瓶状而名。

sentences.english: Stream north Huping cliff, towering cliffs, towering like a bottle-shaped pot and name.
sentences.chinese: 涧北有壶瓶崖，危崖万丈，突兀类壶瓶状而名。

sentences.english: Compressing the bottom of a ceramic olive oil bottle eliminates S cracks.
sentences.chinese: 压缩了陶瓷橄榄油瓶底部裂缝消除S。

sentences.english: That cover belongs to this jar.
